name: pipe
description: During your adventure, you will likely encounter a situation where you need to process data that you receive over the network rather than through a file. Can you find a way to save the output from this program and search for the flag? Connect with {{server}} {{port}}.
hints: Remember the flag format is picoCTF{XXXX}
Ever heard of a pipe? No not that kind of pipe... This kind
author: bobson
